content.text:
# The Headies Award for African Artiste of the Year

}}
The Headies Award for African Artiste of the Year is an award presented at The Headies, a ceremony that was established in 2006 and originally called the Hip Hop World Awards. It was first awarded to Ghanaian hip-hop group V.I.P in 2006.
